lead_paragraph: The charity was added to the list of groups that may not give money to Indian organizations without government permission in the wake of complaints about a trust founder’s being accused of embezzling funds.

headline.print_headline: Indian Authorities Put Restrictions on a U.S. Charity
headline.main: Indian Authorities Put Restrictions on Ford Foundation

snippet: The charity was added to the list of groups that may not give money to Indian organizations without government permission in the wake of complaints about a trust founder’s being accused of embezzling funds.
abstract: India restricts American charity Ford Foundation's funding in wake of complaints about activities of Sabrang Trust, group that received several grants from Ford Foundation; Sabrang Trust founder Teesta Setalvad and her husband are accused of embezzlement.
